data: `minecraft:combat_regeneration`gives Regeneration I and removes Mining Fatigue from the mob that kills the Actor's attack target.

data.Name: regeneration_duration
data.Description: The duration in seconds that the mob will gain Regeneration I.

data.Name: apply_to_self
data.Description: Whether the mob will grant itself Combat Regeneration if it kills the target.

data.Name: apply_to_family
data.Description: Whether the mob will grant mobs of the same type Combat Regeneration if they kill the target.
